text:
*[Bug 18736] _R_CHECK_THINGS_IN_OTHER_DIRS_ does not work on Windows*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18736>

--- Comment #3 from Mikko Korpela (<mailto:mvkorpel@iki.fi|mvkorpel@iki.fi>) ---
(In reply to Tomas Kalibera from comment #2)
Here is the complete list(s) of files the owner of which couldn't be resolved.
All files are in the home directory `C:\Users\<username>` of a user account
with no administrator rights.

These failed with "Access is denied":

- Application Data
- Cookies
- Local Settings
- My Documents
- NetHood
- PrintHood
- Recent
- SendTo
- Start Menu
- Templates

When I look at the files in the first list with `ls -l` in RTools44 Bash, each
of them is a link, and there are no other files of type "link" in the home
directory.

The second list, below, shows files which failed with "The process cannot
access the file because it is being used by another process":

- NTUSER.DAT
- ntuser.dat.LOG1
- ntuser.dat.LOG2
